alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 1:21PM MST until February 20 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 11 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Northwest Beaverhead County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Monday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County
